channel.title: Sharing on i0Ek3 の Galaxy
channel.description: Recent content in Sharing on i0Ek3 の Galaxy

item.title: [Forward] Wealth Creation Mechanisms
item.description: The article forward from here. A catalog of wealth-creation mechanisms One of the guest lecturers aboard the ship [1] (Donald Gibbs, of Pearl-Harbor conspiracy-theory infamy) gave a very interesting talk a few days ago about some of China’s semi-recent history. He opened with a little pop-quiz, which I thought set the stage particularly well, so I’ll co-opt it here to make a different point: Why was the Panama Canal built?
